full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSHIN PO RJES 'DZIN GSER GYI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES GSHIN RO RJES 'DZIN GSER GYI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI THOS BSAM BSGOM GSUM LA BRTZON PA DANG RTOGS PA'I YON TAN @006B PHUN SUM TSOGS PA MER KEN NANG GSO DGE SLONG BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS DANG, DAD DANG DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO DANG, RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG NOR BU SHIS RAB DPAL BZANG PO SOGS BLA MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BZHIN, RIG PA 'DZIN PA DPAL BSHAD PA RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS SA LUG DBYAR 'BRING DKAR TSES BCU BZHI LA AER TE NI JO BO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO ,@007A *, ,'DIS KYANG MAR GYUR 'GRO BA THAMS CAD DUS MYUR BAR ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU BSGROD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: BSHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN,
